catalog_info.title: Speech Communication
catalog_info.notes: Offered jointly with MIT course HST.710. Classes to be held at MIT.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Background equivalent to MIT HST.714.
catalog_info.description: Survey of human speech communication. Acoustic theory of speech production; physiologic and acoustic descriptions of phonetic features, prosody, voice and speech perception and speech motor control. Applications to recognition, synthesis and speech disorders.
